title: My Imprisoned Life
description: When young Mayra disappears the residents of Charleston, WV fear the worse. Years pass by with no clue of her existence. Until a schoolmate turned cop discovers a mentally ill woman that could be Mayra's twin living a bizarre and suspicious life nearly 3 hours from her hometown. Could this young woman be Mayra? How did she get there & what is the Ventura Crime Family's involvement? Mayra's disappearance & secret lie bring to light a world of deception, murder, & a crime so selfish no one would ever believe it.
author: Reyna Hawk
